attributes.action: make NHS spending per head in England equivalent to that in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 2007-08 Total Health spending per capita in Scotland will be £2,019. In England the comparable figure for next year is £1,839. Why should English taxpayers continue to subsidise Scotland and get less?  In addition, in May 2007 Gordon Brown slashed NHS hospital building and equipment budget in England by 1/3rd but left the Scottish budget untouched.
